survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from customers regarding their dining experience at plant-based restaurants to improve service quality and menu offerings.

questions.question_text: How satisfied were you with your overall dining experience at our plant-based restaurant?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale to measure satisfaction levels effectively.
questions.scripter_notes: Use radio buttons for single-choice selection.

script.question_text: How satisfied were you with your overall dining experience at our plant-based restaurant?

questions.question_text: Which of the following menu items did you try during your visit? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections to gather data on popular menu items.
questions.scripter_notes: Use checkboxes for multi-choice selection and include an 'Other' option with a text field.

script.question_text: Which of the following menu items did you try during your visit? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: What was the primary reason for choosing our plant-based restaurant?
questions.client_notes: Include an 'Other' option to capture unique responses.
questions.scripter_notes: Use radio buttons for single-choice selection with an optional text field for 'Other'.

script.question_text: What was the primary reason for choosing our plant-based restaurant?

questions.question_text: How would you rate the quality of the food you ordered?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point scale to assess food quality perception.
questions.scripter_notes: Use radio buttons for single-choice selection.

script.question_text: How would you rate the quality of the food you ordered?

questions.question_text: How likely are you to recommend our plant-based restaurant to others?
questions.client_notes: Net Promoter Score (NPS) can be derived from this question.
questions.scripter_notes: Use radio buttons for single-choice selection.

script.question_text: How likely are you to recommend our plant-based restaurant to others?

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for our menu or service?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture qualitative feedback.
questions.scripter_notes: Use a text area for open-ended responses.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for our menu or service?

questions.question_text: How often do you dine at plant-based restaurants?
questions.client_notes: Helps segment respondents by frequency of dining at plant-based restaurants.
questions.scripter_notes: Use radio buttons for single-choice selection with an optional text field for 'Other'.

script.question_text: How often do you dine at plant-based restaurants?

questions.question_text: How would you rate the portion sizes of the dishes you ordered?
questions.client_notes: Simple scale to assess portion size satisfaction.
questions.scripter_notes: Use radio buttons for single-choice selection.

script.question_text: How would you rate the portion sizes of the dishes you ordered?

questions.question_text: Did you find our menu prices to be reasonable for the quality of food?
questions.scripter_notes: Use radio buttons for single-choice selection.

script.question_text: Did you find our menu prices to be reasonable for the quality of food?

questions.question_text: Would you be interested in attending plant-based cooking workshops or events hosted by our restaurant?
questions.client_notes: Helps gauge interest in additional services or events.
questions.scripter_notes: Use radio buttons for single-choice selection.

script.question_text: Would you be interested in attending plant-based cooking workshops or events hosted by our restaurant?
